Vakoun Issouf Bayo (amụrụ na 10 Jenụwarị 1997) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke Ivorian nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu maka klọb Belgian Charleroi na mgbazinye site na Gent na ndị otu mba Ivory Coast
Bayo sonyeere Dunajská Streda na Machị 2018. O mere egwuregwu mbụ ya na Slovak league megide ŠK Slovan Bratislava na 18 Machị 2018.

Bayo kwagara na klọb Scottish Premiership Celtic na Jenụwarị 2019. A hapụrụ ya n'èzí ndị otu Celtic maka usoro ikpeazụ nke 2018-19 UEFA Europa League, ebe klọb ahụ nwere ike ịdebanye aha atọ n'ime akara ngosi windo anọ ha na Jenụwarị. O mere nke mbụ ya maka Celtic megide Kilmarnock na 17 Febụwarị 2019, na-abịa dị ka onye na-anọchi anya n'oge na-adịghị anya tupu Scott Brown enwee mmeri n'oge.
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020, Bayo bịanyere aka na klọb Toulouse nke France, na mgbazinye otu afọ, yana nhọrọ ọzọ ịzụta.
Na 22 Disemba 2021, Bayo kwetara isonyere Charleroi na mgbazinye ruo na ngwụcha oge, yana nhọrọ ịzụta.
